com.buyanova.service

Interface HorseService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HorseServiceImpl

    public interface HorseService
    HorseService interface is used to describe business logic concerning Horse entity.
    See Also:
    HorseServiceImpl

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addHorse(Horse horse)
      Adds horse to the data source.
      java.util.List<Horse> getAllHorses()
      Returns all horses present in the data source.
      Horse getHorseById(int horseId)
      Returns Horse object with the full information about the horse from the data source.
      java.util.List<Horse> getHorsesFromRace(Race race)
      Returns list of horses that participate in the specified race.
      java.util.List<Horse> getNonPerformingHorses()
      Returns list of horses that cannot perform in races.
      java.util.List<Horse> getPerformingHorses()
      Returns list of horses that can preform in races.
      void removeHorse(Horse horse)
      Removes horse from the list of performing horses.
      void updateHorse(Horse horse)
      Updates information about the specified horse in the data source.

    • Method Detail

      • addHorse

        void addHorse(Horse horse)
       throws ServiceException
        Adds horse to the data source.

        Note: the horse is marked as performing by default.

        Parameters:
        horse - horse that is to be added
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null horse is passed, if horse contains invalid fields, if a data source access error occurs

      • updateHorse

        void updateHorse(Horse horse)
          throws ServiceException
        Updates information about the specified horse in the data source.
        Parameters:
        horse - horse that is to be updated
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null horse is passed, if horse contains invalid fields, if a data source access error occurs

      • removeHorse

        void removeHorse(Horse horse)
          throws ServiceException
        Removes horse from the list of performing horses.

        Note: it marks the horse as non-performing and in the future it can be undone.

        Parameters:
        horse - horse that is to be removed
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null horse is passed, if a data source access error occurs

      • getPerformingHorses

        java.util.List<Horse> getPerformingHorses()
                                   throws ServiceException
        Returns list of horses that can preform in races.
        Returns:
        list of preforming horses
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • getNonPerformingHorses

        java.util.List<Horse> getNonPerformingHorses()
                                      throws ServiceException
        Returns list of horses that cannot perform in races.
        Returns:
        list of non-performing horses
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • getAllHorses

        java.util.List<Horse> getAllHorses()
                            throws ServiceException
        Returns all horses present in the data source.
        Returns:
        list of all horses
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • getHorsesFromRace

        java.util.List<Horse> getHorsesFromRace(Race race)
                                 throws ServiceException
        Returns list of horses that participate in the specified race.
        Parameters:
        race - race which participants are requested
        Returns:
        list of horses that perform in the specified race
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null race is passed, if a data source access error occurs

      • getHorseById

        Horse getHorseById(int horseId)
            throws ServiceException
        Returns Horse object with the full information about the horse from the data source.
        Parameters:
        horseId - id of the requested horse
        Returns:
        horse with the specified id
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs
